DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: VEIGA, J. E.;VEIGA, Jos Eli da;DA VEIGA, J.E.;DAVEIGA,

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Website: www.zeeli.pro.br - Jose Eli DA VEIGA, 72, is Senior Professor at the University of Sao Paulo's Advanced Studies Institute (IEA/USP). Besides writing articles in national and foreign scientific journals, as well as chapters in collective works, he published 29 books. He is also a writer of three op-ed columns: Valor business newspaper, Pgina22 magazine and Radio USP. The ideal of Sustainable Development (SD) has been the core of his attention for almost fifty years. It started in the beginning of the 1970s, while working at the Central Station of Rural Economics and Sociology (National Institute of Agronomic Research ? INRA, Paris, France), and while accomplishing his graduated studies: a Master degree with a dissertation on the European Community rural policy and a PhD Thesis on agrarian reforms, both at the University of Paris, Pantheon-Sorbonne. E-mail: zeeli@usp.br - Website: www.zeeli.pro.br - See also www.sustentaculos.pro.br
